term.title: body burden

item.text: Total amount of substance of a chemical present in an organism at a given time.

sources.item: PAC, 2001, 73, 993. 'Risk assessment for occupational exposure to chemicals. A review of current methodology (IUPAC Technical Report)' on page 1022 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200173060993)
